activity.title: Drag and Drop Multi
activity.instructions: Drag the correct word(s) into each sentence.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: The radio announcer <blank word="told"/>   listeners that a big storm was coming.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: She said <blank word="not to go "/>   without a flashlight.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: My dad told me <blank word="to use "/>   the cell phone in case of emergency.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: Someone in my office <blank word="said "/>   the weather had been pretty bad.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: The newspaper said the government <blank word="had released"/>   a statement.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: The office told people that <blank word="it was"/>   closed until further notice.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: In the latest report, they said that rescuers <blank word="had found "/>   more than 100 victims.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)
audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)
